name: ExpectancyV2
description:
This is a rebuild of a game I recently put up called expectancy. 

The original is an ASP.NET project, but it didn't play in the browser automatically. Instead, there was a zip to download, and the OS didn't trust it. So, I figured it would be better to have a simpler game engine that solely used Javascript.

I hope you like it! 

CONTENT WARNING: violence and horror/terror elements
